Text:
Actually, Moors came in 2 varieties; the regular Moors who were of Semitic origin (Arabs & Berbers) and the Black Moors who were Negroid people from the Arab-conquered region of Mauretania and were subservient to the Semitic Moors. 

The rest of what you wrote is such a mess of nonsensical garbage and syntactical & grammatical assault I would have to suggest you pull your head out of your ass and go to school and don't leave until you can read & write correctly - or at least coherently! - and until you learn some ACTUAL history instead of this bizarre propagandist bullshit!
